description: Glass Sitecore Mapper is an object mapping framework for mapping Sitecore items directly onto an object model allowing you to model your entire Sitecore solution as a data model. The framework handles converting data to and from fields and pulling data from related items.
releaseNotes:
(Issue 16) Fields that donâ€™t exist in Sitecore throwing an exception. An exception will no longer be thrown. This problem was introduced in 2.0.6.0. As part of this change the following data handlers will no return null if a field does not exist: System.IO.Stream, Glass.Sitecore.Mapper.FieldTypes.Link, Glass.Sitecore.Mapper.FieldTypes.Image, Glass.Sitecore.Mapper.FieldTypes.File. Thanks to Michael Metdepenningen for reporting this.
(Issue 18) Changes to the AttributeConfigurationLoader in release 2.0.6.0 caused Sitecore not to load. This was due to how Glass was trying to resolve attributes from inherited classes and interfaces. Thanks to Michael Metdepenningen for reporting this.
Additional data handler to convert Name Value List fields to a NameValueCollection. This is now supported:
[SitecoreField]
public virtual NameValueCollection MyField{get;set;}
title: Glass.Sitecore.Mapper
